scripts.openapi_hono_prisma:dev: cp apps/openapi_hono_prisma/.env.example apps/openapi_hono_prisma/.env && pnpm -F openapi_hono_prisma migrate && pnpm -F openapi_hono_prisma dev
scripts.openapi_hono_drizzle:dev: cp apps/openapi_hono_drizzle/.env.example apps/openapi_hono_drizzle/.env && pnpm -F openapi_hono_drizzle dev
scripts.deps: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf pnpm-lock.yaml && pnpm install
